changelog:
• New Update Beta 6
- Removed Multi-Run Script option in settings

• Shell Section Improvements
- Added Clear option in menu
- Added Recent Commands history
- Fixed prompt to show current directory

• File Selection
- Improved module/script picker for smoother navigation and fewer errors

• Updater
- Added update progress bar
- Added dialog to notify users when download completes

• UI/UX
- Some improvements for smoother navigation and better user experience
